Resume Cover Letter

Bio

Hyeon-jun Yoon was born in South Korea. He enrolled GNTech University in 2013. He has experience as a startup founder in 2016. The team won an excellence award at Startup Campus in South Korea. He was a presenter, marketer and product designer in the team. He noticed that software developer is essential for a startup company and he was inspired from this experience to be a software developer. He decided to go to Canada to learn English and Software Development as well as broaden his horizons. Hyeon-jun graduated 3 years Computer Programming Analysis program from the George Brown College in 2021. While in school, He was awarded Deanâ€™s Honour List that is only awarded to those who have earned the academic distinction.
